CatDescriptText: Signs posted reading, "Ladies Served at Tables Only",  "Swearing or Vulgar Language not Allowed, Respect the Ladies", "State Law Prohibits.  .  .", advertisement for "Squirt" featuring racially stereotypical image, blind robbins, Chickletts
TitMainTitle: Interior of bar with checkered floor, plywood bar, "Calvert" Advertisement above bar, "Budweiser DuBois" illustration
